name: Tear Minecraft Pewdiepie in VR Full Version
name_original: Tear Minecraft Pewdiepie in VR Full Version
description:
This is the Full version, please try the Free version to make sure you PC can run it smooth before buying this one.

The full version has a Katana, Cricket racket, GFuel can that shoots liquid, and many controls for gravity of Pewds, melons and liquids, there are also controls for how stretchy and how easy to tear Pewds.

Controls:

  • Joystick click to teleport
  • Joystick forward/backward, to increase/decrease the size of the grabbing ball
  • Joystick right/left, 60 degree rotation
  • Hold Trigger to grab cloth, GFuel and melons inside the grabbing ball
